author: Nintendo of America
description:
The Hyrule Warriors: Age of Imprisonment game launches Nov 6, 2025, exclusively on the Nintendo Switch 2 system. Pre-order now: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/hyrule-warriors-age-of-imprisonment-switch-2/?utm_source=SW-AA&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=S1012-01&utm_id=S1012-01

Enter the fray and experience the canonical events that lead to the Imprisoning War in the Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom game. Plus, you can receive in-game bonus items if you have save data from the Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom or Hyrule Warriors: Age of Calamity games on your Nintendo Switch 2.

Please check the official website for more details.

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Nintendo of America

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nintendoamerica
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/nintendo
title: Hyrule Warriors: Age of Imprisonment — Fight the Epic Imprisoning War — Nintendo Switch 2

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Black Panther and Cosmic Ghost Rider joins MARVEL Cosmic Invasion, launching later in 2025 on Nintendo Switch! 

King T’Challa, the Black Panther and stalwart leader of Wakanda, dashes into battle wielding his vibranium-enhanced suit and sonic daggers. With peerless martial arts skills and strength, he’ll pounce on any threat or foe foolish enough to challenge him!   

After Annihilus has launched an unprecedented attack across the galaxy, Cosmic Ghost Rider can’t let that go unpunished. Atop his Hell cycle, this wild incarnation of the Rider roars across the spaceways. Beware: this Spirit of Stellar Vengeance punishes by wielding both hellfire and the Power Cosmic! 

#MARVELCosmicInvasion #NintendoSwitch  

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/
title: MARVEL Cosmic Invasion – Black Panther & Cosmic Ghost Rider Reveal – Nintendo Switch
